languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, как вы и приказывали — {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечный"{/d} был приведен в порядок и встал на защиту торговых маршрутов династии. Подданные ликуют и восхваляют вашу заботу о протекторате!"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, как вы и приказывали — {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечный"{/d} был приведен в порядок и встал на защиту торговых маршрутов династии. Подданные ликуют и восхваляют вашу заботу о протекторате!"

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, как вы и приказывали — {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечный"{/d} был приведен в порядок и встал на защиту торговых маршрутов династии. Подданные ликуют и восхваляют вашу заботу о протекторате!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the Heartless has been repaired and deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, just as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the Heartless has been repaired and deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, just as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}the Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

languages.text: 「陛下、{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}は完全に修復され、御命令通り王朝の交易ルートの警護に配備されました。臣民たちは、あなたが保護国家を思慮深く守ってくださると称賛しております！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}は完全に修復され、御命令通り王朝の交易ルートの警護に配備されました。臣民たちは、あなたが保護国家を思慮深く守ってくださると称賛しております！」

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp{/d} tamamen onarıldı ve emrettiğiniz gibi hanedanlığın ticaret yollarını korumak üzere konuşlandırıldı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu durumdan mutlu olan tebaanız ise protektoranıza göstermiş olduğunuz özene övgüler yağdırıyor!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp{/d} tamamen onarıldı ve emrettiğiniz gibi hanedanlığın ticaret yollarını korumak üzere konuşlandırıldı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu durumdan mutlu olan tebaanız ise protektoranıza göstermiş olduğunuz özene övgüler yağdırıyor!"

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} ha sido plenamente reparada y enviada a proteger las rutas comerciales de la dinastía, tal como había ordenado. ¡Sus súbditos, pletóricos, alaban el cuidado que dedica a su protectorado!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} ha sido plenamente reparada y enviada a proteger las rutas comerciales de la dinastía, tal como había ordenado. ¡Sus súbditos, pletóricos, alaban el cuidado que dedica a su protectorado!».

languages.text: “大人，{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}的修复工作已经彻底结束。目前，这艘船正在按照您的指示，负责守护王朝的贸易路线。您所有的臣民都非常开心，盛赞您对王朝的精心照料！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}的修复工作已经彻底结束。目前，这艘船正在按照您的指示，负责守护王朝的贸易路线。您所有的臣民都非常开心，盛赞您对王朝的精心照料！”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, le {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Sans-Cœur{/d} a été entièrement réparé et affecté à la surveillance des routes commerciales de la dynastie, comme vous l'aviez ordonné. Vos sujets sont aux anges et ils se félicitent de l'attention que vous portez au protectorat ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, le {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Sans-Cœur{/d} a été entièrement réparé et affecté à la surveillance des routes commerciales de la dynastie, comme vous l'aviez ordonné. Vos sujets sont aux anges et ils se félicitent de l'attention que vous portez au protectorat ! »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} ist vollständig repariert und wird zukünftig die Handelsrouten der Dynastie sichern. Eure hochgestimmten Untertanen preisen Eure umsichtige Sorge für das Protektorat."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired and has been deployed to guard the dynasty's trade routes, as you ordered. Your elated subjects are praising the thoughtful care you take of the protectorate!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} ist vollständig repariert und wird zukünftig die Handelsrouten der Dynastie sichern. Eure hochgestimmten Untertanen preisen Eure umsichtige Sorge für das Protektorat."
